item.description:
I saw this band last month with the lovely Melissa and Joanna at Knuckleheads, they (the band) sounded great and had an extensive play list.

Knuckleheads has a separate room open to the bar area, which makes a good place for the band to set up and plenty of room on the dance floor so a good time is guaranteed.

There is easy access to the bar for a Jägermeister or for some a Red Bull, I found the bar service was quick and the people working there nice.

Hope to see you there!

http://knuckleheadsnb.com/

http://getluckytheband.com/
item.how_to_find_us: We will be sitting along left wall of the room where the band is set up. A bench runs the lenght of this wall with extra table and chairs.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Get Lucky Band at Knuckleheads in New Bedford
